nodes.text: Doleth Arnoko was a male Duros Rebel Alliance soldier who used to work as a mercenary.
He settled on Tivar II and worked as an informant, but fled from the Imperial Security Bureau to Glare Peak, where he was recruited into a cell led by Jaxon Brand.
Trained as a commando, he believed that the Rebel soldiers could beat Imperial soldiers and that peace could only be found once the Empire fell.
At Glare Peak, he was assigned a rescue operation.

Doleth is one of the pre-generated characters from the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beta. He was then used as one of the pre-generated characters in Fantasy Flight Games special promotion, Rescue at Glare Peak.
